awd_abstract_narration: This project will address topics which offer promise for                   unifying fundamental interactions, in particular, string                        theory.  It will focus on:  (1) The appearance of a low energy                  scale, supersymmetry breaking and the vanishing of the                          cosmological constant; (2) How does nature choose between the                   myriad possible vacua of string theory?                                              This work is at the frontiers of the most abstract parts                   of modern elementary particle theory, so-called "string                         theory."  It is not yet possible to predict the success this                    approach will have in explaining the fundamental interactions                   of elementary particles, or, if it is successful, what                          theoretical and/or practical applications will follow.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
